Articles.Content:
I went thru that whole purchase process and nowhere was there a download button. NOTHING??
I took me 15 minutes to figure out I had to logon to my account, go to account info and find the download screen and the find the down button.

My God what  were you guys thinking about when you set this up, I hope the game isn't a screwed up as this whole mess was.
Which store did you use? The Private Division store? That sounds messy!
Yes, it was a real pain, no download button for the app was the real kicker!!
